name: Napolitana
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin, round crust, topped with fresh San Marzano tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, & oregano. Then fire stone baked.

name: Siciliana
description: Sicilian-style; a thick, rectangular Focaccia(flat leavened oven baked Italian bread) crust. Topped with fresh San Marzano tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, & oregano.

name: Bianca
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin, round crust, topped with a blend of garlic butter, fresh ricotta, mozzarella cheese. Then fire stone baked.

name: Neapolitan Slice
description: Single slice of a 20 inch Neapolitan-style; a thin, round crust, topped with fresh San Marzano tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, oregano. Then fire stone baked.

name: Sicilian Slice
description: Single slice of a 20 inch Sicilian-style; a thick, rectangular Focaccia(flat leavened oven baked Italian bread) crust. Topped with fresh San Marzano tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, & oregano.

name: Bianca Slice
description: Single slice of a 20 inch Neapolitan-style; a thin, round crust, topped with a blend of garlic butter, fresh ricotta, mozzarella cheese. Then fire stone baked.

name: Grandma Pie
description: Long Isl&(NY)-style; a rustic rectangular pan pizza crust, topped with a blend of mozzarella fresca, mozzarella, & garlic. Then fire stone baked. Finaly, finished with San Marzano tomato & basil purees, plus grated Parmesan cheese.

name: Margherita Buono
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin, round crust, topped with mozzarella fresca & olive oil. Then fire stone baked. Finaly, finished with San Marzano tomato & basil purees.

name: Meat Lover
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin, round crust, topped with fresh San Marzano tomato sauce, pepperoni, sausage, meatball, bacon, mozzarella cheese, & oregano. Then fire stone baked.

name: Vegetarian
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin, round crust, topped with fresh San Marzano tomato sauce, mushrooms, green bell peppers, onions, mozzarella cheese, & oregano. Then fire stone baked.

name: Works
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin, round crust, topped with fresh San Marzano tomato sauce, pepperoni, sausage, mushroom, green bell peppers, onions, mozzarella cheese, & oregano. Then fire stone baked.

name: Baked Ziti
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin, round crust, topped with fresh San Marzano tomato sauce, ricotta, ziti pasta, mozzarella cheese, & oregano. Then fire stone baked.

name: Gluten Free
description: Gluten free-style; a thin, round 12 inch pizza crust that is a combination of gluten free flours & starches like rice flour, almond flour, potato starch, & tapioca starch.

name: Cauliflower
description: Cauliflower-style; a thin, round 10 inch pizza crust that is a gluten-free, low-carb & keto pizza recipe. It's a simple blend of cauliflower, eggs, cheese, & a few spices that's flattened & baked into a golden crust.

name: Calzone
description: Neapolitan-style; an Italian turnover, made with leavened dough & folded. Stuffed with mozzarella & ricotta cheeses. Then fire stone baked.

name: Italian
description: Philadelphia(PA)-style; an Italian turnover, made with leavened dough & rolled. Rolled with(Boar's Head) salami, capocollo, soppressata, & provolone cheese. Then fire stone baked.

name: Sausage, Onion, & Pepper
description: Philadelphia(PA)-style; an Italian turnover, made with leavened dough & rolled. Rolled with sausage, onions, peppers, & mozzarella cheese. Then fire stone baked.

name: Meatball Parmesan
description: Philadelphia(PA)-style; an Italian turnover, made with leavened dough & rolled. Rolled with meatballs, marinara, & mozzarella cheese. Then fire stone baked.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Philadelphia(PA)-style; an Italian turnover, made with leavened dough & rolled. Rolled with breaded eggplant cutlets, marinara, & mozzarella cheese. Then fire stone baked.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: Philadelphia(PA)-style; an Italian turnover, made with leavened dough & rolled. Rolled with breaded chicken cutlets, marinara, & mozzarella cheese. Then fire stone baked.

name: Meat Lover Parmesan
description: Philadelphia(PA)-style; an Italian turnover, made with leavened dough & rolled. Rolled with meatballs, sausage, pepperoni, marinara, & mozzarella cheese. Then fire stone baked.

name: Sausage Roll
description: NYC-style; a blend of sausage, onions, peppers, & mozzarella cheese.  Rolled in a light pizza dough. Brushed with garlic herb butter. Then fire stone baked.

name: Garlic Bread
description: An Italian baguette brushed with garlic herb butter & lightly toasted.

name: Sicilian Garlic Bread
description: An Italian baguette brushed with garlic herb butter, then topped with mozzarella cheese. Then lightly toasted.

name: Meatballs & Ricotta
description: Twin Italian style 2oz meatballs accompanied by marinara sauce, ricotta & parmesan cheese.

name: Meatball Sliders
description: Five crostini's topped with our meatballs, marinara sauce, oregenao, & mozzarella cheese.

name: Fries
description: Tossed with salt, black pepper, garlic seasoning, oregano, & parsley.

name: Pepperoni Pizza Fries
description: Bounos Gilbert-style; Our seasoned french fries baked with pepperoni, mozzarella cheese, & oregano. Then finished with marinara sauce.

name: NJ Style Disco Fries
description: New Jersey diner-style; Our seasoned french fries baked with mozzarella cheese. Then topped with a classic brown chicken gravy & parsley.

name: Fried Mushrooms
description: Cremini mushrooms, coated in a light & crispy seasoned batter, then deep fried to golden brown perfection. Served with buttermilk ranch.

name: Fried Zucchini
description: Fresh zucchini sticks, Italian bread crumb dredged, then deep fried to golden brown perfection. Served with buttermilk ranch.

name: Fried Mozzarella Sticks
description: Six whole milk mozzarella sticks, Italian bread crumb dredged, then deep fried to golden brown perfection. Served with marinara sauce.

name: Fried Ravioli
description: Six ricotta stuffed ravioli, lightly Italian bread crumb dredged, then deep fried to golden brown perfection. Served with marinara sauce.

name: Traditional Chicken Wings
description: Bone-in fried chicken wings tossed in your choice of sauce. Served with celery sticks, & choice of dressing.

name: Boneless Chicken Wings
description: Boneless fried chicken pieces tossed in your choice of sauce. Served with celery sticks, & choice of dressing.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Romaine lettuce, Italian style croutons, caesar dressing, & parmesan cheese.

name: House Salad
description: Romaine lettuce, tomato, onion, black olive, oregano, parmesan cheese, & choice of dressing.

name: Chef Salad
description: Romaine lettuce, tomato, onion, black olive, banana peppers, provolone cheese, deli ham, oregano, parmesan cheese, & choice of dressing.

name: Chicken Cutlet Salad
description: Romaine lettuce, tomato, onion, black olive, banana peppers, breaded chicken cutlets, oregano, parmesan cheese, & choice of dressing.

name: Antipasto
description: Romaine lettuce, tomato, onion, black olive, mild giardiniera, provolone cheese, salami, cappocolo, oregano, parmesan cheese, & choice of dressing.

name: Caprese
description: Mozzarella fresca, vine-ripened tomatoes, olive oil, balsamic fig reduction, basil puree, salt, & pepper.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: Breaded chicken cutlets covered with marinara sauce & mozzarella cheese. Served with a side of pasta, small house salad, & small Italian baguette.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Breaded eggplant cutlets covered with marinara sauce & mozzarella cheese. Served with a side of pasta, small house salad, & small Italian baguette.

name: Lasagna Bolognese
description: A baked six layer Neapolitan style lasagna stacked with bechamel, ground beef, marinara, ricotta, mozzarella, & parmesan cheeses. Served with a small house salad, & small Italian baguette.

name: Ravioli Gigante
description: Six jumbo ricotta stuffed ravioli topped with marinara sauce, parmesan cheese, & Italian herbs. Served with a side of pasta, small house salad, & small Italian baguette.

name: Pasta & Marinara Sauce
description: Choice of pasta topped with marinara sauce, parmesan cheese, & Italian herbs. Served with a side of pasta, small house salad, & small Italian baguette.

name: Pasta & Meat Sauce
description: Choice of pasta topped with meat sauce, parmesan cheese, & Italian herbs. Served with a side of pasta, small house salad, & small Italian baguette.

name: Pasta & Meatballs
description: Choice of pasta topped with marinara sauce, two jumbo meatballs, parmesan cheese, & Italian herbs. Served with a side of pasta, small house salad, & small Italian baguette.

name: Pasta & Saugage
description: Choice of pasta topped with marinara sauce, two sausage links,parmesan cheese, & Italian herbs. Served with a side of pasta, small house salad, & small Italian baguette.

name: Meatball Parmesan
description: Foot long Italian baguette stuffed with meatballs, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, & oregano. Then lightly toasted.

name: Sausage Parmesan
description: Foot long Italian baguette stuffed with suasage links, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, & oregano. Then lightly toasted.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: Foot long Italian baguette stuffed with breaded chicken cutlets, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, & oregano. Then lightly toasted.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Foot long Italian baguette stuffed with breaded eggplant cutlets, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, & oregano. Then lightly toasted.

name: Sausage, Onions, Peppers
description: Foot long Italian baguette stuffed with sauteed sausage, onions, peppers, & oregano. Then lightly toasted.

name: Philly Steak
description: Foot long Italian baguette stuffed with sauteed shaved steak, onions, & white wine. Topped with choice of melted cheese. Then lightly toasted.

name: Philly Chicken
description: Foot long Italian baguette stuffed with sauteed shaved chicken breast, onions, & white wine. Topped with choice of melted cheese. Then Foot long Italian baguette stuffed with sauteed shaved chicken breast, onions, & white wine. Topped with choice of melted cheese. Then lightly toasted.

name: Pepperoni Melt
description: Foot long Italian baguette stuffed with pepperoni, marinara, mozzarella cheese, & oregano. Then lightly toasted.
